title: God bless mummy and make her good
creator_credit: ICEM, National Association for Maternal and Child Welfare, George Howe and Sarah Erulkar
brief_description: The homes of ordinary families are visited in order to record the natural reactions of the parents and their children in their own environment, doing the things they do every day. Intended to provoke parents into thinking about their relationships with their children.
